price: 你说：“你们要观察天地之间的森罗万象。一切迹象和警告者，对于不归信的民众是毫无裨益的。
arabic: قُلِ ٱنظُرُواْ مَاذَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ وَمَا تُغۡنِي ٱلۡأٓيَٰتُ وَٱلنُّذُرُ عَن قَوۡمٖ لَّا يُؤۡمِنُونَ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: quli unẓurū mādhā fī al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wamā tugh'nī al-āyātu wal-nudhuru ʿan qawmin lā yu'minūna
